FuncDef:
The ntp disable command disables IPv4 NTP.
The undo ntp disable command enables IPv4 NTP. The ntp disable command disables IPv4 NTP. The undo ntp disable command enables IPv4 NTP. By default, NTP services are enabled.
ExtraInfo:
To disable NTP, run the ntp-service disable command in the system view.
Disabling the NTP function does not delete the existing configuration.
